column4: hi all... i'd like to make my windows list display from the right rather than from the default left? is it possible?
i guess you could right click and move
i tried that but it moves the list out of the screen!
where are the config for windows list?
dunno, just right click and remove and  then go to the other end of the panel and right click, add to panel and select menu
that didnt work either! any ideas where the config file for windows list might be located?
i didnt repeat but wanted to address it to all ... so that all know
core  description: Motherboard  physical id: 0   >>>am i looking in the right place? where will the motherboard name be listed?
Mobile 945GM/PM/GMS, 943/940GML and 945GT Express Memory Controller Hub <<<< is this the motherboard name?
s, i said oops since i was confusing myself with something else >>> my lshw output>>> http://paste.ubuntu.com/65331/ <<< could u check this out and tell me which is my motherboard?
if i didnt know better id say its an 82801
but that  82801G (ICH7 Family) High Definition Audio Controller <<< is this the motherbard? seeems like an audio... how did u get the number?
